text: (Ya) dhava apalya palanakartyacya maphikade ani tya jannatakade jica vistara akasa ani jaminicya vistara'itaka ahe. Ti asa lokansathi banavili geli ahe, je allahavara ani tyacya paigambaranvara imana rakhatata, hi allahaci daya krpa ahe, jyala icchito pradana karato ani allaha motha krpavana ahe
